name: ProtoDungeon (itch)
description:
A prototype of a dungeon builder, where you design a dungeon to stop wave upon wave of heroes making it to the exit.

Controls:

WASD - Move camera
UI - Select placement mode
Left mouse - Place
Right mouse - Remove

Ommitted things/known issues:
- Doesn't prevent multiple doors
- They can walk around corners strangely.
- Many more things

Music by http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/

View the (gross) source here: https://github.com/Rover656/FNGJ-2020/tree/master/35
